title: The Nikon Camera Book 5th Edition 1785462326 (Shailab)
description:
The Nikon Camera Book 5th Edition
Imagine Publishing Ltd


2016
ISBN: 1785462326
English
180 pages
True PDF
46.00 Mb


The Nikon is as timeless a camera as the pictures it takes, and you can master this amazing piece of kit with this new, revised edition of the Nikon Camera Book. Familiarise yourself with photography skills as basic as making your way around using modes, to as advanced as using filters to capture atmospheric landscapes and portraits full of personality. 
You'll learn how to work with models, use the RAW formate, and shoot macro in this comprehensive guide for all Nikon users. Featuring: Guide to Nikon - Get to grips with the specs for all of Nikon's most popular models, and choose the right one for you. Using your Nikon - Start using your Nikon camera, from mastering basic functions to adjusting settings. Advanced techniques - Learn expert techniques to specialise and adjust your approach towards different types of photography. Editing your Nikon images - Take your images from good to great in post-production with Nikon's dedicated editing software.
